key_risks: Industry volatility due to dependence on cruise and tourism sectors
Labor dependencies affecting service quality and operational efficiency
Intense competition from other spa and wellness providers
Customer satisfaction critical to maintaining reputation and financial performance
controversies: Involvement in incidents negatively impacting stakeholders, environment, or operations as per Sustainalytics' Controversies Research
environmental_issues: Need for compliance with varying health and safety regulations impacting operational efficiency and costs
social_issues: Challenges in recruitment and retention of skilled therapists and staff
governance_issues: Potential controversies affecting governance and stakeholder relations
